pages.text:
Discover Southern Hospitality at Robert’s RV Resort
For over 60 years, our family owned and managed company has provided exceptional hospitality to mobile home and RV travelers. Enjoy relaxation by the pool or energetic nights of dancing with our wide range of activities for everyone!
Gain access to:
The largest RV resort in St. Petersburg
Planned activities
Public sandy beaches
Fishing spots
Boating opportunities
We’re Just Moments Away from Your Next Adventure
Located centrally on the Tampa Bay peninsula
Minutes away from award-winning beaches like St. Pete Beach (named Trip Advisor’s #1 Beach in the U.S.)
Convenient location near various entertainment options, including the Dali Museum
Fabulous shopping destinations just a short drive away
Delightful dining experiences in downtown St. Petersburg
Memorable adventures at popular nearby attractions like Busch Gardens and Walt Disney World
Minutes from the Bay to the Gulf
Nearby Pinellas walking and biking trail system
Many nearby beach towns with fresh seafood and quaint shops
Next to the vibrant and exciting downtown St. Petersburg
We’re Committed to Exceeding Your Expectations
Receive exceptional hospitality and become a part of the welcoming community, where our commitment to understanding and exceeding guests’ expectations guarantees an unforgettable stay.
FAQs
Q: What services are available at your sites?
All sites are full hook-up and include water, sewer, and 30/50 amp service.  Electric service is individually metered and is charged at .17 per kwh.
Q: What is the max size of your RV lots?
While most of our lots will accommodate RVs up to 45 feet, we do have select lots that will allow for rigs and trailers of 60 feet or more.
Q: What pet breeds are allowed?
We are a pet friendly community, but we are breed restricted. For insurance purposes aggressive breeds like Pit Bulls, Rottweilers, Staffordshire Terriers, Chow-Chows, Dobermans, Mastiffs, Cane Corsos, German Shepherds, Akitas, Presa Canario,and Wolf Hybrids are not allowed.
Q: What are your rates?
Nightly
$95
Weekly
$495
Monthly
$975 – 1595 per month plus electricity
The amount is based on the size of your RV and availability.
You can get further rate information
here
.
Q: Why do we need to fill out an Intake Packet?
The Intake Packet serves to provide us with the necessary details to book your reservation as well as provide you with further information about the Resort regulations.
